name: AFGBuildablePipeBase
comment: Pipeline for transferring liquid and gases to factory buildings.

methods.name: GetConnection0
methods.comment: @return The connections, safe to assume its always valid.

methods.name: GetSplineMesh
methods.comment: Get the mesh used for this conveyor.

methods.name: GetLength
methods.comment: Get the length of the spline in world space

methods.name: FindOffsetClosestToLocation
methods.comment: Helpers for finding locations on the pathing spline

methods.name: GetConnectionType
methods.comment:
@return The UClass for the connection type for this pipe. All pipe types should have their own function here, or their connection can snap to the wrong type of pipes.
[DavalliusA:Tue/22-10-2019] this is med with a function, so we don't have to store a variable in all the instances of this class

properties.name: DEFAULT_PIPE_HEIGHT
properties.comment: Default height above ground level for pipes

properties.name: mMesh
properties.comment: Mesh to use for his conveyor.

properties.name: mMeshLength
properties.comment: Length of the mesh to use for this conveyor.

properties.name: mLength
properties.comment: Length of the pipe in centimeters.

properties.name: mConnection0
properties.comment:
First connection on the pipe (can be an input and an output, because, again, pipes)
MUST BE SET FROM CONSTRUCTION SCRIPT OR IT WILL BE NULL!

properties.name: mConnection1
properties.comment:
Second connection on the pipe (can be an input and an output, because, again, pipes)
MUST BE SET FROM CONSTRUCTION SCRIPT OR IT WILL BE NULL!

properties.name: mSplineData
properties.comment: Compact representation of mSplineComponent, used for replication and save game

properties.name: mSplineComponent
properties.comment: The spline component for this splined factory.

properties.name: mInstancedSplineComponent
properties.comment: The spline meshes for this train track.

properties.name: mIsSignificant
properties.comment: Is this buildable significant, i.e. is within significance range
